description: Rarely available 2 level townhome in The Oasis complex. This is a corner bright unit with 1519 sq feet 3 bedroom +2.5 Bath with beautiful upgrades in the kitchen & all bathroom. This unit comes with 1 parking and 1 storage locker .Convenient for everything! Well kept and maintained complex. Walking distance to Cook elementary school. Canada Line, Richmond public market, Lansdowne center, Kwantlen Polytechnic University & Walmart shopping. Catchment MacNeill Secondary. No Pets allowed in this building.
